div.p: J.E.Y. was supported by a University of Bristol Post-Graduate Scholarship, A.J.Y. and A.N.R. were supported by BBSRC David Phillips Research Fellowships (BB/H022716/1 and BB/C520555/1). We thank all those who contributed to maintaining the long-term study system (especially Dominic Cram, Linda Casson and Padraig Cregg), Ilse Weites for laboratory assistance, Xavier Harrison for advice on statistical analysis, Nigel Bennett for logistical support and Tswalu Kalahari Reserve for site access and logistical support in the field.
